full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BSRUNG DBANG MO DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005b (ZHES BSTAN BSRUNG DBANG MO DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI` DGA' LDAN THUB BSTAN RAB RGYAS GLING GI T'A BLA MA DANG BRTZON LDAN ZHING MKHYEN DPYOD RAB TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL BA, DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG DPAL LDAN LHA MOS @006A *, ,BSAM PA BZHIN TU TSUL BZHIN 'GRUB GYUR CIG ,ZHES SBYAR BAR BYA'O, ,'DI YANG NYER MKHO'I BA'I YANG LAG TU DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SHAR MAR SPEL BA'O,, ,,)
